text:
As many as 340 bags of subsidised Amma Cement, sold by Tamil Nadu Government, were seized near here on Friday.

The Election flying squad of Kilpennathur Assembly constituency led by tahsildar Vediyappan was conducting vehicle check near Vanniyanur in Tirukkoilur Road.

They intercepted a lorry and checked and found 340 bags of Amma Cement that was being transported without relevant documents.

The cement bags were sent to Tamil Nadu Civil Supply Corporation taluk godown in Chengam Road here. — Staff Reporter
title: 340 bags of Amma cement seized
